title: Love You Anyway

Hey
You know I’m gonna

(Love you anyway, love you anyway)

(Love you anyway, love you anyway)

And after that
[Chorus]
You know I’m gonna
(love you anyway, love you anyway)
Swear I’ma prove it
(Love you anyway, love you anyway)
Dammit, I’ll do it
(Love you anyway, love you anyway)

I know I’m gonna
(Love you anyway, love you anyway)
